Qardio | https://www.getqardio.com | Everything! | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE | Full-time

Help make healthcare easy and beautiful! Join the Qardio team and help us make heart health better and cheaper for everyone.

If you love working with and integrated hardware/app/cloud platform and seeing the fruit of your work shipping to the shelves of major retailers, get in touch: we are looking for Product Managers, Software Engineers, Embedded Software Engineers, Analog Electronic Engineers, Digital Electronic Engineers, Technical Writers, Mechanical Designers.

We are also hiring on the marketing front. Our offices are in downtown SF.

Email stars at getqardio.com to apply, or visit https://www.getqardio.com/careers/ where we are adding new job openings every week.
